Browse the source code of netbsd/external/bsd/blacklist/lib/blacklist.c

31#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
32#include "config.h"
33#endif
34
35#include <sys/cdefs.h>
36__RCSID("$NetBSD: blacklist.c,v 1.5 2015/01/22 16:19:53 christos Exp $");
37
38#include <stdio.h>
39#include <bl.h>
40
41#include <stdarg.h>
42#include <errno.h>
43#include <string.h>
44#include <stdlib.h>
45#include <syslog.h>
46
47int
48blacklist_sa(int action, int rfd, const struct sockaddr *sa, socklen_t salen,
49 const char *msg)
50{
51 struct blacklist *bl;
52 int rv;
53 if ((bl = blacklist_open()) == NULL)
54 return -1;
55 rv = blacklist_sa_r(bl, action, rfd, sa, salen, msg);
56 blacklist_close(bl);
57 return rv;
58}
59
60int
61blacklist_sa_r(struct blacklist *bl, int action, int rfd,
62 const struct sockaddr *sa, socklen_t slen, const char *msg)
63{
64 return bl_send(bl, action ? BL_ADD : BL_DELETE, rfd, sa, slen, msg);
65}
66
67int
68blacklist(int action, int rfd, const char *msg)
69{
70 return blacklist_sa(action, rfd, NULL, 0, msg);
71}
72
73int
74blacklist_r(struct blacklist *bl, int action, int rfd, const char *msg)
75{
76 return blacklist_sa_r(bl, action, rfd, NULL, 0, msg);
77}
78
79struct blacklist *
80blacklist_open(void) {
81 return bl_create(false, NULL, vsyslog);
82}
83
84void
85blacklist_close(struct blacklist *bl)
86{
87 bl_destroy(bl);
88}
89
